title: Explore Featured Prompts
subtitle: Selected high-quality prompt templates, one-click apply to use

dora.title: Doraemon Comic Set
dora.prompt: Generate three Doraemon-themed comic images, vertical, bright colors, cinematic comic panels, optimized for Instagram, royalty-free, and publish directly to Instagram

cats.title: Cute Cats Illustrations
cats.prompt: Generate three cute cat-themed illustration images, fresh palette, vertical, optimized for Instagram, royalty-free, and publish directly to Instagram

vintage.title: Vintage City Posters
vintage.prompt: Generate three vintage movie-poster style city night images, vertical, optimized for Twitter, royalty-free, and publish directly to Twitter

agentFeatures.title: Aitoearn Key Feature
agentFeatures.subtitle: Our signature features, one click away
agentFeatures.helperExample: Example: Generate images about "street food" with oil painting style and suggest publish times for Instagram

inspiration.title: Creative Inspiration
inspiration.desc: Generate topic ideas and creative templates from account traits and trends

oneClickScript.title: One-click Script
oneClickScript.desc: Auto-generate short video / article scripts and storyboard details from keywords or prompts

multiTemplates.title: Multi-style Templates
multiTemplates.desc: Provide multiple video and copy style templates with one-click switching

imageGenerate.title: Image Generation
imageGenerate.desc: Generate high-quality images from prompts, supporting multiple styles and outputs

videoGenerate.title: Video Generation
videoGenerate.desc: Produce short video drafts from scripts or prompts, including music and shot suggestions

highlight.title: Highlight Editing
highlight.desc: Automatically detect high-energy moments and create highlight clips using templates

storyboard.title: Storyboard Design
storyboard.desc: Auto-generate timeline, dialogue and shooting checklist with export support

coverSuggestion.title: Cover & Thumbnail
coverSuggestion.desc: Generate multiple cover options and suggest click-optimized thumbnails

download.title: Asset Download & Convert
download.desc: Fetch platform videos, batch-download in multiple resolutions and convert formats

videoTranslation.title: Video Translation
videoTranslation.desc: Support face-level lip-sync, voice cloning and embedded/soft subtitle export

platformAdapt.title: Platform Adaptation
platformAdapt.desc: Automatically adjust copy length, pacing and format to target platform rules

topicTag.title: Topic & Tag Recommendation
topicTag.desc: Recommend high-value topics and tags based on trends and account history

seo.title: SEO & Keyword Optimization
seo.desc: Provide search and discovery optimization suggestions for copy and descriptions

schedule.title: Scheduled Publishing
schedule.desc: Support one-time, recurring and timezone-aware scheduling and auto-publish

multiPlatform.title: Multi-platform Distribution
multiPlatform.desc: Configure once and automatically sync and publish to multiple channels

smartTime.title: Smart Time Suggestion
smartTime.desc: Recommend optimal publish times based on historical data to maximize reach

sse.title: Streaming Tasks (SSE)
sse.desc: Stream task generation in real-time with incremental results and cancel support

taskManagement.title: Task Management
taskManagement.desc: Create/stop/view/delete tasks, rate and comment; support task forwarding and duplication

workflow.title: Extensible Workflows
workflow.desc: Support multi-step pipelines and custom action handlers to chain complex automation

videoUnderstanding.title: Video Understanding
videoUnderstanding.desc: Automatically recognize emotions, people and events to generate tags and chapters

report.title: Reporting & Insights
report.desc: Auto-generate publish performance and growth suggestions for review and optimization

commentAssistant.title: Comment & DM Assistant
commentAssistant.desc: Auto-generate reply suggestions and batch-reply templates to boost engagement

audienceInsight.title: Audience Insights
audienceInsight.desc: Provide audience profiles and content preference analysis to guide topic and targeting
